definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Add a retaining ring feature to the selected shaft section.
sentences.chinese: 将扣环特征加入至选取的轴剖面。

sentences.english: Rings shall vanish from our noses.
Ex:Can you fix the broken clasp on my necklace?
sentences.chinese: 你能修理我项炼上坏掉的扣环吗？

sentences.english: She gazed proudly at the shiny buckles on her shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她骄傲地注视着鞋上闪亮的扣环。

sentences.english: Place baby into the carrier and attach the fastenings and buckles.
sentences.chinese: 发生婴儿到承运人和重视的紧固件和扣环。

sentences.english: If that retaining ring is misaligned, a bullet could conceivably jam in the barrel.
sentences.chinese: 如果扣环没有位移子弹会堵塞在枪桶里。

sentences.english: They can meet the requirements of wheel tyre retaining rings of different models of locomotives for rolling.
sentences.chinese: 该机能满足不同型号机车轮箍扣环滚压的要求。

sentences.english: I had one of my students bring me a cotton lead rope with a bull snap on one end.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个学生，帮我带了一条一端附有扣环的粗棉绳。

sentences.english: She stood, checking the clip on her harness. It was tight.
sentences.chinese: 她站著，检查她挽具上的扣环，太紧了。

definition: a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
hidden snap fastener (concealed behind a flap on a garment)
ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
belt/band/ribbon/strap/girdle/(coll.) audio or video tape/Farrer's scallop (Chlamys farreri)/comb pen shell (Atrina pectinata)
